DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare Motivational Enhancement Therapy ( MET ) standard drug abuse treatment among pregnant woman .
DOC.brief_title: Motivational Enhancement Therapy Improve Treatment Utilization Pregnant Substance Users - 1
DOC.criteria: Pregnancy < 30 week Have attend drug treatment past 28 day Not need residential treatment ( except detox ) Not risk suicide/homicide Have pending legal charge ( except drug treatment )
